item.description:
We've tried a couple of team trivia games at different locations. Now it's time to try a new one! Obrien's Pub. The prizes are bigger, and most importantly, it starts earlier than our previous locations!

Join us for dinner/appetizers/drinks/whatever and some team trivia action. You don't have to be a master of trivia, and we get to huddle (as a team) before turning in any answers, so there is *NO* pressure.

Trivia starts just after 9 and goes pretty quickly. We'll meet at 8:00 so we have time to chat and taunt the other teams with our patented triple Ts (Trivia Trash-Talking).
item.how_to_find_us: I'm 5'8" with brown hair. Try my cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: Trivia at Obrien's EARLIER TIME
